subject: Re: [junit] Re: Launching JUnit Test with Java code
msgSnippet: ... That works, but I recommend you /do not/ invoke a static method on an instance. Instead, do this: TestRunner.run(AllTests.suite()); Creating an instance
messageBody:
sachem_iner wrote:

> Just need to change :
> TestRunner.run(testSuite.getClass());
>
> by :
> TestRunner.run(testSuite.suite());

That works, but I recommend you /do not/ invoke a static method on an
instance. Instead, do this:

TestRunner.run(AllTests.suite());

Creating an instance /only/ to invoke a static method works, but is
confusing, and any good compiler will warn you against doing it.

Take care.
